meanings.definition: The action of leading a group of people or an organization.
meanings.sent1: Her leaderships in the project were crucial for its success.
meanings.sent2: The company values strong leaderships in its management team.
meanings.sent3: His multiple leaderships in different clubs make him the busiest student on campus.
meanings.sent4: The leaderships of the orchestra conductor guided the musicians to a flawless performance.
meanings.sent5: The leaderships of the captain steered the team to victory.

meanings.definition: The ability to lead or guide others.
meanings.sent1: Effective leaderships involve clear communication and decision-making.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated exceptional leaderships during the crisis.
meanings.sent3: His lack of leaderships in the group project led to confusion among team members.
meanings.sent4: The leaderships of the teacher inspired the students to work hard.
meanings.sent5: Natural leaderships can emerge in times of need.

meanings.definition: The position or function of a leader.
meanings.sent1: He was promoted to a leaderships role within the company.
meanings.sent2: The leaderships of the CEO are crucial for the company's success.
meanings.sent3: In the game of chess, the pawn aspires to reach a leaderships position.
meanings.sent4: The leaderships of the coach were evident in the team's strategy.
meanings.sent5: She embraced the leaderships responsibilities with enthusiasm.
